newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Baloise sees double-digit profit growth.
newsitem.headline: Baloise sees double-digit profit growth.

text.p: Swiss life and non-life insurer Baloise Insurance Group confirmed an earlier forecast that net profit would rise this year by a double-digit percentage.
"Baloise continues to expect profits for 1996 to increase by a double-digit percentage," the company said in a statement released at a news conference.
In October, Baloise said it expected 1996 net profit to rise by around 14 percent.
Baloise posted a 1995 net profit of 161.1 million Swiss francs after 135.3 million in 1994. Gross premium income last year was 6,479 million Swiss francs after 6,280 million in 1994.
